author: USA TODAY, Kelly Lawler, USA TODAY
title: It's OK to slow down: Why you don't have to optimize your coronavirus quarantine
description: More time at home doesn't mean more free time just because you're in coronavirus quarantine. Experts say it's OK to be tired, not wired right now.
content:
It's vital to clean surfaces you touch every day amid the coronavirus outbreak. Here are mistakes to avoid.
USA TODAY
It's OK to be tired right now. We promise. 
Just thinking of all the effects the coronavirus pandemic has had on our lives is exhausting, … [+5974 chars]
